content.rendered:
Directed by Anup Kurian.

Written by Anup Kurian.

Cast Kartik Elangovan(Killer 1). Vinay Forrt(Killer 3 (as Vinay Fort)). Aahana Kumra(Jaya). P.T. Manoj(Durai). Yadu Sankalia(Killer 2). Naseeruddin Shah(Colonel). Vipin Sharma(Sett). Sridevi(Census Woman). Tippu(Kuttappan Patti). P.J. Unnikrishnan(George)

Languages English. Hindi.

Producers Colin Burrows. Merliyn Joseph. Anup Kurian. Arun Kurian. Jojo Mathew. Mathewkutty J. Mattam. Dennis Robert. Sachein Shah.

Production Visual Possibility.
